XmlSubscriptionWriter

public XmlSubscriptionWriter()
                      throws TransformerConfigurationException
Sets up the XML generator and its dependencies so an output file can be generated.

TransformerConfigurationException - If an output XML file could not be properly configured and set up.
Method Detail

output

public void output(DefaultListModel map,
                   String outputFile,
                   Timestamp ts)
            throws SAXException,
                   IOException
Outputs the specified address entries to the specified file.

Parameters:
map - The list of addresses to output to the file system.
outputFile - The file to output the specified address entries to.
ts - The time-stamp of the submission.
Throws:
SAXException - If there are any problems writing an output XML file.
IOException - If the output file cannot be opened to write.
